segments.text: How about eating out for a drink with me tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tonight ? I'm afraid I can't . I've promised Mark to go to the gym . Can we make it tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Let's say 6:30 p . m . at the Royal Restaurant , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . See you tomorrow night .
segments.speaker: S2
